_description: Four lines at the end of an exemplum ‘Contra Auariciam’

BodLauMis497.Transcription:
Couetyse me hath yshentþe fendes harlyth my
                    body…
BodLauMis497.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus Codices Laudiani.
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1858: 358.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild.
